update goods_lose_info set shop_name = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_detail = #{goodsDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_lose_amount = #{totalLoseAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, turnover_percent = #{turnoverPercent,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, operator_no = #{operatorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_update = #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from goods_lose_info where 1 = 1
and gmt_create <= to_date(#{gmtCreateUp},'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') and gmt_create >= to_date(#{gmtCreateDown},'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
